item.title: Gritting needed in Hill Close to the corner and on the exit onto Greenway., 4th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Hill Close, Elmstead, Greater London

item.title: 7 inch pothole opposite junction with Coxtie Green Road and Weald Road, 4th January
item.description:
There are two big pothole and has been here for over six months. There is a pinch point in the road which potentially could cause an accident as motorists are avoiding these potholes and driving in the middle of the lane.
